TEXT.TITLE: MADAGASCAR TENDERS FOR 20,000 TONNES SOFT WHEAT
TEXT.BODY: Madagascar will tender today for two 10,000-tonne cargoes of soft red winter wheat for last-half July and first-half August shipments with PL480 financing, U.S. exporters said. Reuter
